snippet.title: President Obama answers questions from the media
snippet.description:
* President Barack Obama: Hello, everybody. Before I begin I just want to express on behalf of the American people our deepest condolences to the Republic of Korea, and the families of all those who've seen their loved one last when I ferry sank within the last couple of days. Obviously information is still coming in. We know that many of the victims...
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/17/politics/obama-news-cobference-transcript/index.html

snippet.title: At a schoolhouse, Afghans vote for change
snippet.description:
* In the cold rain outside a girl's school in Kabul, a queue stretches several hundred meters down the road. Some are dressed in western clothes, others in traditional shalwar kameez. One man is wearing overalls covered in paint from the work site he's just come from.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/06/world/asia/afghanistan-election-voter-reaction/index.html

snippet.title: Why we're still running a year after Boston
snippet.description:
* I was about halfway through the marathon when I saw the man with the plastic pink flamingo. Like me, he was jogging down a highway in coastal North Carolina. Unlike me, he had a beanie -- yes, with propeller -- perched on his head.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/11/opinion/sutter-run-boston-finish/index.html

snippet.title: Clancy on Flight 370: Never had a story with 'so few facts, so much speculation'
snippet.description:
* In 33 years with CNN, Jim Clancy has been almost everywhere and seen almost everything. That includes covering the aftermath of horrific commercial jet crashes, like Pan Am Flight 103 in Lockerbie, Scotland, and Swissair Flight 111 in Halifax, Nova Scotia.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/05/world/asia/jim-clancy-flight-370/index.html

snippet.title: Doctors in Afghanistan didn't die in vain
snippet.description:
* Once again, the news from Afghanistan fills us with sadness and suggests that perhaps we should despair, that maybe it's time to give up hope for the country.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/24/opinion/ghitis-doctors-slain-afghanistan/index.html

snippet.title: GOP 2016 hopefuls address big donors in Vegas
snippet.description:
* (CNN) - They may have their sights set on the White House, but Saturday they were in Sin City, talking up donation high rollers. Several GOP leaders spoke at the Republican Jewish Coalition's annual spring leadership meeting in Las Vegas, where some of...
http://politicalticker.blogs.cnn.com/2014/03/29/gop-2016-hopefuls-address-big-donors-in-vegas/

snippet.title: Mysterious fatal shooting in eastern Ukraine adds to tension
snippet.description:
* Mystery surrounds a shooting incident on a country road in eastern Ukraine that left several people dead and ratcheted up tensions in the region, where pro-Russian groups have seized government buildings and set up roadblocks in defiance of authorities in the Ukrainian capital, Kiev.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/20/world/europe/ukraine-shooting/index.html

snippet.title: Landslide search: 'I don't think anything could prepare you'
snippet.description:
* Slogging through sometimes waist-deep mud, rescuers returned to the "unreal" scene of a deadly Cascade Mountain landslide Thursday with the grim expectation that more bodies waited underneath them.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/27/us/washington-landslide/index.html
